THANK YOU SO MUCH. Some of these programs are just downright hard to find. Does anyone have Advanced Outlook Express Recovery (not password recovery, just recovery)

just to let everyone know, symantec antivirus ce is reporting the following as viruses. I assume because they are uses to get passwords from the operating system, but I'm not sure...

setup.exe from Proactive.Password.Auditor.v1.61.incl.crack
setup.exe from Proactive.System.Password.Recovery.v4.1
Some AV will report false-positives on password recovery software.
